XenotypeDef.label: Fleshman
XenotypeDef.description: Fleshman — a terrifying creation of dark magic. It seems this creature has almost nothing human left. Created through dark archotechnology, cultists mark their melee warriors in this way. They use dangerous flesh whips in close combat, which pose a deadly threat.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Fleshman — a terrifying creation of dark magic. It seems this creature has almost nothing human left.
